title: Grand Canyon Gets Camera Obscura Treatment
description:
Using a camera obscura, photographer Abelardo Morell snapped a picture of the Grand Canyon using the ground as a canvas. See the image, one of many he took on a journey to inspire fresh appreciation of America's national parks.

Read the story in National

asset.author: NationalGeographic
asset.hookText:
Using a camera obscura, photographer Abelardo Morell snapped a picture of the Grand Canyon using the ground as a canvas. See the image, one of many he took on a journey to inspire fresh appreciation of America's national parks.

Read the story in National Geographic Magazine:
http://ngm.nationalgeographic.com/2013/10/morell-parks/oneill-text

PRODUCER: Shannon Sanders, NGM Staff
PHOTOGRAPHY: Abelardo Morell
